title: Chintz Fragments, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for red and purple applied over resist. Madder dyed. Blue applied by immersion over resist. (chintz)
description: Fragment of a larger design. Fragment includes part of a stripe, part of a floral arrangement, and what might be the tail of a bird.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragments, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for red and purple applied over resist. Madder dyed. Blue applied by immersion over resist. (chintz). Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-5-a,b.
